14.5.4 Section 3. Appropriate weight gain during pregnancy
The following section will include questions on weight gain during pregnancy
Q16:  Does your country have document(s) providing national recommendation(s) on appropriate weight gain 
during “normal” pregnancies? (If “No” or “No information available”, go to Question 23)
 1   Yes
 2   No
 3   No information available
If Yes, please provide information
